content:
The CI builds of FHIR R5 contain GraphQL definitions for download (https://build.fhir.org/fhir.schema.graphql.zip). Unfortunately, these documents contain some errors which renders them invalid. I have opened a Pull Request fixing these errors several weeks ago (https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core/pull/615). I have not received any feedback, yet. What is the process of moving this forward? Can anyone of the core contributors have a look?

As far as I understand, the GraphQL generation code I touched is only used for generating the aforementioned R5 schema definitions? So my changes should not break any HAPI GraphQL functionality?

Some feedback would be greatly aprecciated!
Thank you very much for merging the PR!
